summary: Most requested brochure-site features appear implemented (4 routes, shared layout, themed styling, services structure, and static contact form with client-side validation). However, the diff introduces Internet Identity/auth-related plumbing, actor/query infrastructure, and a backend Motoko canister stub—items explicitly called out as non-goals/constraints for a static marketing site.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration (provider/hook usage and AuthClient-based logic) despite being a non-goal and constraint.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/login/Internet Identity integration as non-goals; the diff adds and wires an InternetIdentityProvider and related hook implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor integration and react-query-based actor fetching for authenticated/anonymous identities.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires a static brochure site with no backend dependencies and no Motoko canister logic; the diff adds useActor that creates an actor and depends on identity.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a backend Motoko canister stub (backend/main.mo).
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraint says to keep the site static without requiring Motoko canister logic / do not introduce additional backend services; adding a backend canister file is unrequested and risks implying backend dependence.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark/light theme toggling infrastructure via next-themes ThemeProvider and theme-dependent logo selection logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in requirements; also introduces theme logic in header (even if logoSrc currently isn’t rendered).

hallucinated_features.description: Added social media icon links in the footer using react-icons.
hallucinated_features.reason: Footer requirements only mention company name, tagline, and basic contact placeholders; social icon links and react-icons usage were not requested.
